English: Central Plain, the middle and lower regions of the Yellow river, including Henan, western Shandong, southern Shanxi and Hebei

d.f: `黃河~`下游~`一帶~，`包括~`河南~`的~`大部分~、`山東~`的~`西部~，`河北~、`山西~`的~`南部~`及~`陝~`西~`的~`東部~。

English: Central Plain, the middle and lower regions of the Yellow river, including Henan, western Shandong, southern Shanxi and Hebei
